name: Marinus
description:
This is an experimental project developed to test my volumetric fog system. It was bit of a technical challenge to get it running on WebGl. 

The game contains references and secrets to uncover. For casual players it feels like a calming experience, but for explorers it can get dark pretty quickly.

Playthrough and let me know of your thoughts.

Credits: 

Programing ---------------Alwin Joshy
Art ------------------------- Alwin Joshy
Music ---------------------- Alwin Joshy
